topic.title: EMS Vital Signs Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67801?1" EMS Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Vital Signs"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain at least one [1..*] organizer
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67518?1" Obtained prior to units EMS care (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type BL
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67519?9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.20 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.19 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8480?6" Intravascular systolic (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "mm[Hg]".
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8462-4" Intravascular diastolic (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "mm[Hg]".
Such organizers SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8867?4" Heart rate (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9279?1" Breaths (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8310?5" Body temperature (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "Cel".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="2710?2" Oxygen saturation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value
UCUM units will typically be "%".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="19889?5" Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value
UCUM units will typically be "%".
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="19911?7" Diffusion capacity.carbon monoxide (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type PQ
UCUM units will typically be "[ppm]".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="2339?0" Glucose (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type PQ
UCUM units will typically be "mg/dl".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67775?7" Level of responsiveness (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet LevelOfResponsiveness 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.21 STATIC
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="56840?2" Pain severity verbal numeric scale (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component Contains zero or more [0..*] value with data type INT
An ordinal value between 0 and 10, inclusive. There are three scales, but the values are equivalent.
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67520?7" Stroke scale overall interpretation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.29
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet StrokeScale 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.88 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.30
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9267?6" Glasgow coma score.eye opening (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9268?4" Glasgow coma score.motor (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="55285?1" Glasgow coma score special circumstances (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component MAY contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD
This component SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9269?2" Glasgow coma score.total (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT
Integer value equal to the sum of verbal, motor, and eye
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9270?0" Glasgow coma score.verbal (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value
SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67801?1" EMS Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Vital Signs"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23"/> <id root="1278809527" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="67801?1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS Vital Signs"/> <title>EMS Vital Signs</title> <entry> <organizer> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </organizer> </entry> </section>
